name: Nova's Cube! (itch)
description:
A new bullet hell game!

You are a cube. Your goal is to survive as long as possible.
You can build your own fights in Sandbox mode!

Lots of guns and upgrades to buy and use!

Do you have what it takes to play this bullet hell game?

https://novascube.weebly.com

Please note the video on here does not show all the enemies, Game modes, etc!
